title: oTToDev is Becoming the BEST Open Source AI Coding Assistant
description:
There are a LOT of exciting things happening right now with oTToDev, our fork of Bolt.new that aims to be the BEST open source AI coding assistant. 

Last week, we launched our community over on the oTTomator Think Tank, and we've already seen a huge increase in engagement in the project after that!

Given all the recent work put into oTToDev, there are a lot of new features I want to highlight for you in this video. On top of that, l also cover a roadmap for oTToDev we've been working on and give an update on crowdfunding to support efforts for this project. 

At the very end I walk through some troubleshooting steps for oTToDev as well to help you get it up and running yourself!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I'm building something BIG behind the scenes:

https://ottomator.ai/

Join the Bolt.diy (previously oTToDev) community over in the oTTomator Think Tank!

https://thinktank.ottomator.ai

Here is the link to Bolt.diy on GitHub. Check out the README to see future improvements planned!

https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy

Link to the initial roadmap I shared in the video:

https://roadmap.sh/r/ottodev-roadmap-2ovzo

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Intro
00:57 - New Features (PRs) in oTToDev!
03:46 - Showcasing New oTToDev Features
05:44 - oTToDev Roadmap
09:44 - Crowdfunding Update
10:26 - Troubleshooting Steps for oTToDev
14:21 - Outro

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Artificial Intelligence is no doubt the future of not just software development but the whole world. And I'm on a mission to master it - focusing first on mastering AI Agents.

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT! Sundays and Wednesdays are for everything AI, focusing on providing insane and practical educational value. I will also post sometimes on Fridays at 7:00 PM CDT - specifically for platform showcases - sometimes sponsored, always creative in approach!
